Sentencas: A novel integrated process is presented for power, hydrogen, and heat generation through water electrolysis in the presence of carbon dioxide (CO2) captured from a power plant flue gas.
Titulo: Economic cost and performance analysis of a novel trigeneration scheme utilizing CO2 capture and solid oxide electrolysis units

Sentencas: The proposed system consists of a CO2 capture unit, a solid oxide electrolysis unit (SOEU), a steam power cycle, a heat recovery unit (HRU), and an ammonia power cycle.
Titulo: Economic cost and performance analysis of a novel trigeneration scheme utilizing CO2 capture and solid oxide electrolysis units

Sentencas: The overall energy and exergy efficiencies of the power plant are 34.84% and 83%, respectively.
Titulo: Economic cost and performance analysis of a novel trigeneration scheme utilizing CO2 capture and solid oxide electrolysis units

Sentencas: In addition, it is demonstrated that the total exergy destruction and exergy destruction rate of the proposed cycle are 1357576 kW and 0.081 GJ/kWh.
Titulo: Economic cost and performance analysis of a novel trigeneration scheme utilizing CO2 capture and solid oxide electrolysis units

Sentencas: The total net output power of the proposed power plant is determined at 60046.6 kW. Heat recovery values in SOEU and CCU units respectively equal 1158 and 22.17 MW.
Titulo: Economic cost and performance analysis of a novel trigeneration scheme utilizing CO2 capture and solid oxide electrolysis units

Sentencas: Based on the exergy analysis, the largest exergy destruction happens in the HRU unit (79%) with a value of 1066340 kW.
Titulo: Economic cost and performance analysis of a novel trigeneration scheme utilizing CO2 capture and solid oxide electrolysis units

Sentencas: The environmental analysis indicates that the direct CO2 emission rate is zero and the indirect one is 0.53 kgCO2/kWh.
Titulo: Economic cost and performance analysis of a novel trigeneration scheme utilizing CO2 capture and solid oxide electrolysis units

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the economic analysis shows that the total annual cost of the proposed power plant is 75.36 M$ and the production cost of electricity equals 0.15 $/kW.
Titulo: Economic cost and performance analysis of a novel trigeneration scheme utilizing CO2 capture and solid oxide electrolysis units
